menu: Classic Veggie Pizza (Fresh red onions, fresh grenn peppers, fresh mushrooms, babycorn & red paprika on a tandoori sauce base )

Non Veg Platter 12 pc Tender Chicken wing marinated in select spices & served with a sauce of your choice (BBQ Sauce, Tandoori Sauce, Hot Sauce)
Papas Chicken Strips 5 Chicken Fillets Baked to Golden Brown. Served with a Choice of Dipping Sauce.
Family Meal 2 Regula Pizzas + 1 Starter + 1 Salad
Group Of 10 2 Large Pizzas + 1 Regular Pizza + 2 Starters + 2 Salads
